title: Pixel 4 notifications overlapping with the calendar.
content:
Hi,

I have recently bought new Pixel 4 phone and overall I am satisfied with the device so far. Although there is an issue which is really annoying, my notifications are overlapping with the calendar on locked screen. 
Does anyone have similar problem?
I am attaching the Imgur link to the screenshot of that issue.

http://imgur.com/gallery/rzoeCcp

Thanks
